attributes.action: Implement congestion charging in all major UK cities by 2009
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Car usage is increasing in the UK.
Requesting car users to voluntarily reduce car usage is not working.
The UK needs to prove the seriousness of its intention to signficantly reduce its contribution to global warming by moving beyond Kyoto.
Simply enabling councils to implement on a local basis will not work as some councils may prevaricate for policitical or 'local competition' reasons.
A strategic implementation is required for the benefit of the country and the planet
